snippet: Rangers General Manager Glen Sather, usually tight-lipped around reporters, discussed Sean Avery's future and the team's game Thursday against Sidney Crosby and the Penguins.
abstract: Rangers General Manager Glen Sather, usually tight-lipped around reporters, discussed Sean Avery's future and the team's game Thursday against Sidney Crosby and the Penguins.

headline.main: Rangers' Sather Takes Time to Talk About Avery and Crosby
